scripts.dev: npm run compile && cross-env MODE=DEVELOPMENT electron --inspect ./dist/main.js
scripts.dev:win: npm run dev & start chrome chrome://inspect/#devices
scripts.dev:mac: npm run dev & open -a 'Google Chrome' chrome://inspect/#devices
scripts.build:win: npm run compile && node ./script/rimraf.js ./dist-win && electron-builder --win --config ./builder/builder.config.js && node ./script/post-build.js
scripts.build:mac: npm run compile && node ./script/rimraf.js ./dist-mac && electron-builder --mac --config ./builder/builder.config.js && node ./script/post-build.js
scripts.update:all: npm install -S axios@latest cors@latest electron-log@latest electron-updater@latest express@latest fs-extra@latest js-yaml@latest trumangao-utils@latest && npm install -D @types/cors@latest @types/express@latest @types/js-yaml@latest @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin@latest @typescript-eslint/parser@latest cross-env@latest electron-builder@latest eslint@latest prettier@latest rimraf@latest typescript@latest
